channel.title: Watch.DocNYC
channel.description: The official website of the DOC NYC film festival.

item.title: DOC NYC Announces 2023 Lineup
item.description: DOC NYC, the leading documentary film festival in the United States, has announced its 2023 lineup. The festival will take place from November 10-19 in New York City.
item.author: DOC NYC

item.title: Tickets on Sale Now for DOC NYC 2023
item.description: Tickets are now on sale for DOC NYC 2023. The festival will take place from November 10-19 in New York City.
item.author: DOC NYC

item.title: DOC NYC Announces 2023 Jury
item.description: DOC NYC, the leading documentary film festival in the United States, has announced its 2023 jury. The jury will be led by Academy Award-winning filmmaker Laura Poitras.
item.author: DOC NYC

item.title: DOC NYC Announces 2023 Partners
item.description: DOC NYC, the leading documentary film festival in the United States, has announced its 2023 partners. The festival is proud to partner with a wide range of organizations, including HBO, Netflix, and the Tribeca Film Institute.
item.author: DOC NYC
